item.title: Https for everything
item.description: HTTPS is highly recommended for every web site, as a web developer I am building both my personal and company app under https. Applying for the certificates could be a block for you to migrate/build your site to https as you need to pay for it and it could take quite a while. Thanks to letsencrypt now we can have free open certificate authorify for our sites. I will list the least steps to build a site by using certbot
